p: A 60 g portion of Fraction 2 was subjected to column chromatography using Sephadex ® LH-20 (GE Healthcare, Danderyd, Sweden) as the stationary phase. Three fractions, 2a (7.30 g), 2b (20.28 g) and 2c (5.84 g) were obtained following elution with various ratios (9:1; 7:3 and 3:7) of dichloromethane:methanol. Since UPLC-MS analysis revealed that 2a contained the compounds of interest ( m/z 536, m/z 469), it was further purified on silica gel using mixtures of hexane:ethyl acetate and ethyl acetate:methanol sequentially. The obtained fractions 2a1 and 2a2 were finally purified using targeted prep-HPLC-MS, to yield compounds ( 2) ([M + H] + m/z 536, 238 mg) and ( 3) ([M + H] + m/z 469, 500 mg). Compounds ( 4) ([M − H] − m/z 301, 84 mg), ( 5) ([M − H] − m/z 469, 100 mg), ( 6) ([M − H] − m/z 483, 74 mg) ( 7) ([M − H] − m/z 541, 17 mg), ( 8) ([M − H] − m/z 599, 42 mg) were purified from Fraction 1d, while compound ( 9) ([M − H] − m/z 695, 27 mg) was purified from Fraction 1c.
